sentences.english: Now, I stay idle at home, can I file in the where?
sentences.chinese: 现在我赋闲在家，请问我的档案在什么地方？

sentences.english: During the depression; millions of the unemployed wandered around in the streets.
sentences.chinese: 经济疏落时期，有好几百万的赋闲者在街头游荡。

sentences.english: I can't understand why a man of about 40 should not work for three years.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白为什么一个40岁左右的男人要赋闲三年。
